Entries.SpicySebMines/f Sebastian 250/t 1600 200: Upper_Ambient/18 8/farmer -1000 -1000 0/skippable/pause 500/warp farmer 18 13/move farmer 0 -5 0/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 200/playSound crafting/pause 100/playSound clubhit/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 100/viewport 18 8/pause 100/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 100/viewport 18 8/pause 100/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/message "As you're reaching for the elevator button, the cave is immediately shrouded in nothing but darkness."/pause 200/message "You've never seen the lights in the caves go out."/pause 200/message "As you stand stock still, afraid to move another inch, you can hear footsteps on the gravelly floor: footsteps that stop right behind you."/pause 200/playSound sandyStep/pause 400/playSound sandyStep/pause 400/playSound sandyStep/pause 400/playSound sandyStep/pause 500/message "Your blood runs cold through your veins as a low whisper reaches your ears."/pause 200/message "'Be careful. You never know what's lurking in the dark.'"/pause 800/playSound pickUpItem/pause 200/playSound sandyStep/pause 400/playSound sandyStep/pause 400/playSound sandyStep/pause 400/playSound sandyStep/pause 500/playSound sandyStep/pause 500/playSound sandyStep/pause 500/message "The presence behind you disappears, carried away on the sound of gravel crunching underfoot. As soon as it's gone, the lights flicker back on."/pause 500/playSound clubhit/pause 100/playSound crafting/viewport 18 8/pause 100/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 100/viewport 18 8/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/message "You hesitantly reach into your pocket and pull out the small object placed inside just moments ago."/pause 200/message "A frozen tear."/pause 500/emote farmer 4/message "You immediately drop it, causing a loud shatter."/pause 100/playSound breakingGlass/pause 1000/message "It was sticky."/pause 28/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end

Entries.SpicySebRoom/f Sebastian 750/e 2794460/t: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 1 2 Sebastian -100 -100 2/skippable/doAction 1 3/removeTile 1 3 Buildings/removeTile 1 2 Front/viewport 6 6 true/move farmer 0 4 1/pause 500/message "Looks like Sebastian's not here. You're surprised he's not at his computer."/pause 200/message "Why not take a peek at his computer to see what he was so defensive about the other day?"/pause 200/question fork0 "#Wait for him to show up.#Snoop through his computer."/pause 200/fork waitForSeb/pause 300/move farmer 5 0 1/move farmer 0 2 1/move farmer 3 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer 1 0 1/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 3/showFrame farmer 117 true/positionOffset farmer -60 5/pause 500/playSound mouseClick/pause 200/playSound mouseClick/pause 200/message "You expected to be met with a complicated password screen, but when you shake the mouse to wake up the monitor, it shows the last application Sebastian was using."/pause 200/message "You wonder if he was in a hurry when he left since he didn't lock his stuff."/pause 200/message "That doesn't really matter, though. What matters is that you snoop as fast as you can since you have no idea when Sebastian'll return."/pause 500/message "You have a feeling that things won't be pretty if you get caught."/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 500/message "Your eyes take in everything on the screen before you, seeing what appears to be an array of camera feeds. It reminds you of the security officer's screen back when you worked for Joja."/pause 200/message "The closer you look, the more disturbed you become."/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 500/message "'Is that... my bedroom?'"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 500/message "You scan over all of the various camera shots and realize that there's not just a single camera in your bedroom."/pause 200/message "Every single feed on Sebastian's computer is from somewhere in your house."/pause 200/warp Sebastian 1 1/move Sebastian 0 4 1/speak Sebastian "What the hell are you doing?$5#$b#Why are you going through my stuff?$5"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/move Sebastian 5 0 1/pause 200/speak Sebastian "How much did you see? Don't you dare lie to me.$5"/pause 200/quickQuestion #I swear I didn't see anything.#Weirdly enough, I saw the inside of my house.(break)speak Sebastian "Bullshit.$5"(break)speak Sebastian "Oh, that IS weird.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/message "You ask Sebastian why the hell he has cameras inside of your house, and his laugh gives you goosebumps."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Why not?$3#$b#I need to keep an eye on my perfect, little farmer.$h"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.waitForSeb: /pause 300/move farmer 4 0 1/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame farmer 107/positionOffset farmer 0 -45/pause 3500/warp Sebastian 1 1/move Sebastian 0 4 1/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 500/emote Sebastian 12/pause 500/move Sebastian 4 0 0/pause 200/speak Sebastian "What are you doing in here? You didn't touch my computer, did you?$5"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Seriously, did you touch my computer?$5#$b#Don't you dare lie to me.$5"/pause 200/message "You shake your head and tell him that, no, you didn't touch his computer."/pause 200/message "You explain that you just sat around and waited for him to return."/pause 200/emote Sebastian 12/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Good. Never, ever go through my stuff, or I'll make sure you regret it.$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 500/message "The threat has you trembling, but that doesn't stop you from voicing your question: what's so important that he needs to hide it from you?"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Even if you know what it is, nothing's going to change for you.$h"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 500/message "You ask him what the hell that's supposed to mean."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "It means that there's nothing you can do about it.$1#$b#So, are you really that desperate to know what it is?$1"/pause 200/message "Sebastian laughs when you immediately say 'yes.'"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Camera feeds.$3#$b#To be more specific, camera feeds from inside your house.$1#$b#I can guarantee you'll never find the cameras, though.$h"/pause 200/message "You sit there with your mouth agape, just staring at Sebastian for a few moments."/pause 500/message "When you find your voice, you ask him what the hell is wrong with him, and he simply laughs again."/pause 200/emote Sebastian 32/pause 500/speak Sebastian "There's nothing wrong with me.$h#$b#The problem is that there's everything RIGHT with you.$l#$b#You're just... perfect.$4#$b#Absolutely perfect.$4"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.SpicySebBackwoods/f Sebastian 1250/e 384: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 36 14 3 Sebastian -100 -100 3/skippable/viewport 32 14 true/move farmer -8 0 3/playSound leafrustle/pause 100/playSound leafrustle/warp Sebastian 32 14/move Sebastian -3 0 3/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/message "You're pretty sure that your heart jumps into your throat by the way it suddenly becomes hard to swallow, startled by Sebastian's sudden appearance."/pause 200/message "Where did he even come from? Was he hiding somewhere and waiting for you, or had he been following you the entire time?"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/speak Sebastian "...$l#$b#You know, I was surprised that you came to visit me when I was working on my motorcycle the other day.$l#$b#I thought you would've been pissed about the cameras.$h"/pause 200/question fork0 "#Have you taken them down yet?#Actually, I realized that I didn't really mind them."/pause 200/fork takeCamerasDown/pause 300/speak Sebastian "Oh, is that so?$7"/pause 200/message "Sebastian's body language seems to be saying that he's doing his best to retrain himself and keep from pinning you against a tree and fucking you until you can't walk."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "I'm glad you know what's best for you, gem.$l#$b#If you had decided to put up a fight over them, I'd have had to punish you.$h#$b#While it'd be fun for me, I can promise you that the chances you'd enjoy it are very, very slim.$l"/pause 200/message "You can't figure out an appropriate response, but Sebastian speaks again and saves you from the struggle of thinking of what to say."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Just keep being a good boy, and it'll start being fun for both of us.$h^Just keep being a good girl, and it'll start being fun for both of us.$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sebastian 1/move Sebastian 10 0 1 true/emote farmer 60/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.takeCamerasDown: /speak Sebastian "You know I can't do that, @.$2#$b#Like I said, I need to keep an eye on my precious gem.$l"/pause 200/message "You politely request that he take them down anyway. When he declines, you ask him to at least tell you where they are so that YOU can take them down."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Sorry, but those cameras are staying up.$7#$b#Well, to be honest, I'm not sorry: not when I get to see your cute body in the shower or curled up in bed.$l"/pause 200/message "Frustrated, you ask how he hid them so well, and you get a laugh in response."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "They're extremely tiny cameras, about the size of my fingertip.$7#$b#They're also extremely expensive, so if you do manage to find any, you better not wreck them, or I'll wreck YOU.$h"/pause 200/message "Curious, you inquire as to how he afforded the cameras if they're as expensive as he claims."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "The money I've been saving to leave this shitty town.#$b#Watching my gem is absolutely worth it.$l"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 20/pause 1000/faceDirection Sebastian 1/move Sebastian 10 0 1 true/emote farmer 60/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.SpicySebTelescope/f Sebastian 1500/e Spi: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 14 29 3 Sebastian -100 -100 3/skippable/bgColor 0 0 0/changeToTemporaryMap NightSceneMaruMap false/ambientLight 0 0 0/viewport 14 23 true/pause 2000/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/pause 200/message "Maru had given you permission to use the telescope whenever you wanted. She said that you needed something fun to do after working so hard all day."/stopAnimation farmer/pause 200/message "Gazing at the beautiful stars was definitely fun."/pause 1000/warp Sebastian 23 29/move Sebastian -9 0 3/positionOffset Sebastian 20 0/animate Sebastian false true 100 40/message "You're so absorbed in trying to identify a planet that you feel the person behind you before you hear them."/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 500/message "You really, really hope what you feel isn't what you think it is."/pause 200/message "Unfortunately, by the way the person grinds against you, you can easily tell that it is, in fact, what you think it is."/pause 200/message "An erection."/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Sebastian "See anything cool?$7"/pause 200/message "Sebastian's inquiry is nothing more than a whisper against the shell of your ear."/pause 200/quickQuestion #The stars looks even prettier up close.#No, but I feel something warm.(break)speak Sebastian "The same could be said about you.$4#$b#I'd love to get even closer, but..."\pause 200\message "He places his hands on your hips and pulls you back with that leverage."\pause 200\positionOffset farmer 2 0\pause 200\message "His erection presses harder against your back, and you can feel its warmth."\pause 200\message "There's no way for you to back away from the telescope with how Sebastian's holding you there."(break)speak Sebastian "Oh, this?$h"\pause 200\message "Sebastian shifts his hips to slowly drag his erection along your clothed back."\pause 200\emote farmer 28\pause 500\emote farmer 12\pause 500\speak Sebastian "If you want, I could warm you up inside.$7#$b#It'll just be you and me beneath the sheets.$l"/pause 500/stopAnimation Sebastian 12/pause 500/faceDirection Sebastian 1/emote Sebastian 20/speak Sebastian "I'll see you later, gem.$l"/pause 200/move Sebastian 15 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.SpicySebConfession/e sendTracksMail/t 19: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 29 47 0 Linus 29 37 0 Sebastian -100 -100 0/skippable/pause 200/message "You checked, double-checked, and triple-checked that letter you received before you headed to the train tracks."/pause 200/message "You're pretty sure you know who it is, so really, you don't need to be there, right?"/pause 500/viewport 29 42/viewport move 0 -1 2000/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 2/pause 200/showFrame Linus 22/jump Linus/shake Linus 1000/pause 500/speed Linus 5/move Linus 15 0 1/pause 200/warp Linus -100 -100/emote farmer 40/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/message "Your secret admirer is... Linus? Of all people?"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 500/warp Sebastian 29 47/move Sebastian 0 -2 0/textAboveHead Sebastian "Why are you on the tracks?"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/message "Oh, thank god. That's who you were suspecting to begin with, so..."/pause 200/emote farmer 12/pause 500/emote farmer 8/message "You ask Sebastian if he's the one that's been sending you the... well, somewhat disturbing mail."/pause 200/message "He laughs."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Obviously.$4#$b#You can't possibly be stupid enough to think it was Linus, right?$h"/pause 200/emote farmer 12/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Aw, don't pout.$h#$b#Even if you're a little stupid, you still shine in every other way, gem.$4"/pause 200/move Sebastian 0 -1 0/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 500/emote Sebastian 20/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Now scurry home and take a shower.$4#$b#Put on a show for me, yeah?$l"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.SpicySebExhib/f Sebastian 2250/d Mon Tue: Saloon1/-1000 -1000/farmer 40 22 0 Sebastian 42 21 3 Sam 35 18 0 Abigail 33 18 0/skippable/pause 500/viewport 33 18/pause 1000/emote Sebastian 20/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 400/playSound Cowboy_monsterDie/pause 50/playSound Cowboy_monsterDie/pause 50/playSound Cowboy_monsterDie/textAboveHead Abigail "Ugh!"/pause 1000/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 200/emote Sam 8/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 200/speak Sam "What's up? Why'd you stop playing?$8"/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/pause 500/speak Abigail "I hate it.$5"/pause 200/speak Sam "Hate what?$8"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Seeing Sebastian with @.$3"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/emote Sebastian 20/pause 500/speak Abigail "Sebastian was supposed to be with ME.$5"/pause 200/emote Sam 40/pause 500/speak Sam "Seb's his own guy, you know?$2#$b#You can't force him to like you."/pause 200/textAboveHead Sebastian "I'll be right back."/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move Sebastian 0 -2 0/move Sebastian -8 0 3/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 200/speak Sebastian "What's going on?#$b#Listening to the 'game over' music over and over is driving me insane.$5"/pause 200/speak Sam "Abigail's just upset that yâ€”"/speak Abigail "It's gross watching the two of you be all cute together when @ doesn't even deserve you.$5"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Sebastian "'All cute'?$2#$b#We can stop being cute and start being something a lot more inappropriate.$7#$b#Would you rather watch us fuck?$h"/pause 200/emote Sam 16/emote Abigail 12/pause 500/speak Abigail "That's disgusting!$5"/faceDirection Sebastian 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Sebastian "How does my gem feel about a little exhibitionism?$4"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 200/emote Sebastian 20/pause 500/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 200/emote Sebastian 32/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Come on, gem. Be a good boy and follow me.$l^Come on, gem. Be a good girl and follow me.$l"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speed farmer 4/move farmer -4 0 3/move Sebastian -10 0 3 true/advancedMove farmer false 0 -2 -10 0/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end Dialogue Sebastian "I can't tell what's better, gem: the way you sound or the way you taste."

Entries.SpicySebStart/f Sebastian 2750/O Sebasti: continue/-10000 -10000/farmer -100 -100 2 Sebastian -100 -100 2/skippable/warp Sebastian -100 -100/warp farmer -100 -100/viewport 64 15 clamp true/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 64 15/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 2/playSound doorClose/faceDirection Sebastian 2/warp Sebastian 64 15/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Sebastian "Meet me at the saloon tonight after four o'clock.$l#$b#I promise you'll regret it if you don't.$h"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/addMailReceived sebSaloonEventAgree/end Dialogue Sebastian "Don't forget, gem: saloon after four o'clock.$l"

Entries.SpicySebSaloon/n sebSaloonEventAgree/t 1: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 31 14 0 Sebastian 32 9 3 Abigail -100 -100 1 Sam -100 -100 3 Gus -100 -100 3/skippable/viewport 32 7 clamp true/pause 200/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 200/textAboveHead Sebastian "Hey, gem."/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 700/speak Sebastian "You came. Good boy.$h^You came. Good girl.$h"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 500/move Sebastian -1 0 3/positionOffset farmer -25 0/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 200/message "Sebastian has you backed up against the barrels, the two of you hidden away from the liveliness in the rest of the saloon."/pause 200/message "His leg is between yours, trapping you there. You don't mind it though."/pause 200/message "In fact, you're enjoying it a little too much."/pause 200/message "Sebastian smirks when you moan, and you have to resist the urge to hide your face in embarassment."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Aw, look at my little gem blushing like a virgin.$l"/pause 500/warp farmer -100 -100/warp Sebastian -100 -100/warp Abigail 36 20/warp Sam 42 21/faceDirection Abigail 1/faceDirection Sam 3/viewport 35 18 true/pause 500/animate Sam true true 1000 34 4/pause 500/emote Abigail 12/pause 200/stopAnimation Sam/emote Sam 8/pause 400/speak Sam "What's that face for?$8"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Didn't you hear that?$5"/pause 200/speak Sam "Hear what?$8"/pause 200/speak Abigail "The sound of a loose slut moaning in the back room.$5"/pause 200/emote Sam 40/pause 500/speak Sam "No, I didn't hear it, and even if I did, who cares?$2"/pause 200/speak Abigail "Me! I don't want to have to hear that.$5"/pause 200/emote Abigail 12/emote Sam 32/pause 300/speak Sam "Jealousy doesn't look good on you, Abigail.$3"/pause 200/emote Abigail 12/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Gus 31 9/faceDirection Gus 3/viewport 32 7 true/pause 500/emote Gus 28/pause 500/speak Gus "Why are these barrels... sticky?$2"/pause 200/emote Gus 40/pause 500/emote Gus 4/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.SpicySebFaux/f Sebastian 3250/O Sebastia: continue/-1000 -1000/Pierre 4 17 2 Caroline 6 19 0 Abigail 13 20 0 farmer 16 26 3 Sebastian 16 27 0/skippable/pause 500/message "It takes some pleading and a blowjob, but you manage to convince Sebastian to come with you to Pierre's."/pause 200/message "Sebastian stands beside you in the aisle, smiling at you as you hum softly while you look at your options."/pause 200/viewport 16 23 true/pause 200/emote Sebastian 32/pause 500/speak Sebastian "You're the cutest, gem.$1#$b#You better tone it down, or we might need to leave before we even finish shopping.$l"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 500/emote Abigail 12/pause 500/move Abigail 3 0 1/move Abigail 0 4 2/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/emote farmer 16/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Or... we could always have fun in the store instead.$h"/pause 200/emote Abigail 12/pause 400/speak Abigail "Don't you dare.$5"/pause 200/positionOffset Sebastian 0 -25/emote farmer 16/pause 400/emote Sebastian 32/pause 400/message "Like that day you were using Maru's telescope, you feel Sebastian behind you, his hands on your hips with an almost bruising grip."/pause 200/message "He presses his hips forward, making you gasp."/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Sebastian "I really should just lock you away, gem.$l#$b#That way, no one else could see you the way I do.$l"/pause 200/message "When the initial shock wears off, you're able to feel something familar poking against your back."/pause 200/message "He's already half hard."/pause 200/textAboveHead Abigail "Gross."/pause 200/speed Abigail 3/faceDirection Abigail 0/move Abigail 0 -8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
